name: When Sibasish searches for a specific query string they should be able to see the video section in search results

testSteps.description: Given Sibasish is able to open the Google homepage

children.description: Sibasish opens the browser at https://www.google.co.in/

testSteps.description: When Sibasish searches for "UI Automation using Serenity"

children.description: Sibasish searches for the text 'UI Automation using Serenity' in the Google Search
Sibasish enters 'UI Automation using Serenity' into 'Search' input field
Sibasish clicks on Google Search Button

testSteps.description: Then they should see the "Videos" section

children.description: they verify that the Google Search produced results with a Videos Section
they should see the element containing text 'Videos' that is displayed

testSteps.description: And they should be able to verify that the videos are relevant to "Serenity"

children.description: they verify the relevance of the search results with the search string 'Serenity'
they should see Video Results that is displayed
they should see Video Results with text content that contains (ignoring case): <[Serenity]>

title: When Sibasish searches for a specific query string they should be able to see the video section in search results

rule.name: Google Search results must contain a video section when applicable
